channel.title: Getting a different player's name instead of yours
channel.description:
Hey. Im working on a project, which is to trade by a command. I got it [i]almost[/i] finished, but I cant get it to send the item or get it to say the other player's name. I have tried [code]"+playerHandler.players.[i]playerName+"[/code] or something around that line (I didnt get errors from it, I just cant remember the full thing) and when I tested it, it got me disconnected. Even with a disconnected = false; right above/below it. Anyways, if you can help me make it transfer the item and/or get the other player's name, I will give you parshal credit when I post the tutorial ;)
Thanks for helping... If you did!
~Lin
